Mobilná aplikácia Tipsport je povinnosťou každého správneho stávkara, ktorý si rád staví kedykoľvek a odkiaľkoľvek chce. Moderná aplikácia od najväčšej stávkovky v Českej republike ponúka všetko podstatné. Od neprebernej ponuky športových aj mimo športových udalostí a stávkovania na predzápasové aj live kurzy až po vychytávky, ako rýchle stavenie sólovky cez minitiket, najvymakanejší cashout a uzavretie príležitosti. Po novom je umožnené vytvárať MIX tikety, teda kombinovať na jednom tikete predzápasové aj live stávky. Aplikácia umožňuje detailné nastavenie zasielania upozornení, medzi ktoré patria aj notifikácie k dôležitým udalostiam zápasov alebo závodov. 

Aplikácia vám tiež zaistí zapojenie do najväčšej stávkarskej komunity u nás. Môžete sa inšpirovať obľúbenými stávkarmi a ich analýzami, zverejnenými tiketmi v obľúbenej Tiket aréne, alebo si prečítať najzaujímavejšie blogy. Samozrejmosťou je prístup do najrozsiahlejšieho diskusného fóra a možnosť zapojiť sa do aktuálnych súťaží. 

Tipsport aplikácia obsahuje: 

• kompletnú a prehľadnú ponuku zápasov zo širokej palety športov ako sú futbal, hokej, tenis, basketbal, volejbal, hádzaná, bojové športy, rugby, snooker, motoršport, dostihy, badminton alebo aj baseball, florbal a biatlon  
• neustále sa rozširujúcu ponuku stále populárnejších ešportov  
• možnosť upraviť si poradie obľúbených športov a vyhľadávanie v predzápasovej ponuke  
• pokročilé funkcie s tiketom - cashout a uzavretie príležitosti 
• možnosť zapnutia upozornení (push notifikácií) k jednotlivým zápasom alebo celým súťažiam  
• bohaté štatistiky k predzápasovým príležitostiam spolu s informáciami, na čo stavili ostatní stávkari  
• všetky zásadné informácie k live príležitosti ako je aktuálny stav, live štatistiky, tracker, live stream, udalosti popisujúce priebeh zápasu alebo závodu  
• veľký výsledkový servis obsahujúci priebeh zápasu alebo závodu  
• tisíce priamych prenosov s exkluzivitou pre hokejovú Tipsport extraligu  
• prehľadný zoznam stavených tiketov s jasnou indikáciou stavu  
• upravenú sekciu Môj účet s prístupom k rýchlemu vkladu alebo výberu peňazí z herného účtu, ku kompletnej histórii transakcií a všetkým dôležitým správam  
• široké možnosti nastavení – prepínanie medzi svetlým a tmavým vzhľadom, radenie príležitostí na tikete a zobrazovanie ďalších informácií pri príležitostiach na tikete  
• nastavenie upozornení pre zasielanie push notifikácií a správ do aplikácie zo všetkých oblastí

Týmuj is an app for easy organisation and communication in sports teams and groups. Suitable for any sport. Managers, leaders or coaches can easily manage their teams directly from their mobile phones. The application can be used in combination with the web platform available at www.tymuj.cz.
 
MULTIPLE TEAMS WITHIN SINGLE ACCOUNT
Sports organisers can create any number of teams and control them from a single account in the application. Likewise, athletes can have all their activities in one place. Regular members can be made into team managers and given the right to create events, invite new members, etc.

TEAM LINE-UP
You can see all team members in one place, including their profile information. The number of team members is not limited. Optional fields can be set for each team, such as the player´s post or jersey number.
Send an invitation to the team easily by e-mail, via SMS or, for example, Whatsapp. New members can either only be invited to the team, or they can be invited directly to participate in existing scheduled events. In a team, you can also restrict the display of some details to its members and increase the feeling of privacy.

SUBGROUPS
You have the option of creating subgroups (for example, A team and B team or field players and goalkeepers) within the list of members and planning events for them separately or setting a separate participation limit for them.
 
TRAININGS AND MATCHES AT A GLANCE
If you are a coach or manager, you can easily plan events and invite players or teammates directly from your mobile.
As a member of the team, you will quickly learn when and where you play or train. You are receiving up-to-date information on whether the event capacity is already full or if the event has been cancelled for some reason. You can save each event to your calendar on your mobile phone.
 
ATTENDANCE
You will confirm your participation in the event within a few seconds. With mobile attendance, team leaders will know in time who they can count on and who is skipping this time and why. You can also assign non-team members to events. If the event is full, the applicant can join the queue and will be informed if the place becomes available. You can easily find out who you can rely on based on the statistics.
 
NOTIFICATION
The notification system speeds up the response to new events in the team. The invitation to the event, created by the captain, will come to everyone on time. Everyone will also learn about the change or cancellation of the event immediately. No one can make excuses for not knowing about something. Choose for yourself whether you want to receive notifications directly to your mobile phone or by e-mail.

NOTICE-BOARD
Write and share important articles, information or instructions for the team. Add files or create a quick poll, so you know what new colour of jerseys the team prefers.

TEAM CHAT AND CHAT FOR EVENTS
You can discuss everything important in one place. Let team members know about new messages with the notification system.
You can use a separate chat for each match or training. You can agree, for example, who takes the car or what the tactics will be.

GALLERY
A gallery is available for each team, in which they simply create albums and upload photos from matches or camps.

WALLET
In the wallet module, you can easily create payment requests for membership fees or for the gym. You will have a clear record of payments and you will see who owes or how much is left in the team wallet.

PARTICIPATION STATISTICS
The application automatically calculates and visualizes the trend of participation in the last 20 events to which the user has been invited. It is possible to distinguish between overall and team-specific statistics.

LANGUAGE MUTATIONS
Týmuj is now available in Czech, Slovakian and English. Other languages ​​will follow.

Performance Test is a companion app for the VBOX Sport which uses a high accuracy GPS receiver to enhance the capabilities of your iPhone.

This app requires a connection to a VBOX Sport to collect performance data. Without this connection you will only be able to see a demonstration of its capabilities, it will not allow you to measure the performance of your car.

Collecting GPS data at 20 times per second the VBOX Sport provides a level of accuracy currently unheard of with iPhone and iPad apps.  Our  Performance Test app uses this data to provide you with acceleration, deceleration and VMAX information for your vehicle previously only available to professional Racelogic VBOX users.
 
You can quickly and accurately measure your 0-60 acceleration time, turn your test track into a dragstrip and measure your 1/4 mile time and trap speed. Different modes allow you to measure your braking performance and zero to zero times, all using the same VBOX technology used by all the major motor manufacturers and car magazines around the world.

All of the apps functionality is available when you are connected via Bluetooth to an iOS device running iOS 7.0 or later.  If you are not connected to a VBOX Sport the app will launch in demo mode to allow you to sample the features.

For more information on the VBOX Sport from Racelogic and to find details of your local dealer please visit www.vboxmotorsport.co.uk

**Stryd learns what kind of runner you are and adapts to your ever improving fitness to prescribe run training that is personalized and specific to your skill set. You receive sweet spot run training guidance that will train you to improve your performance and continually build on those gains for weeks, months, and even years at a time.

Through a combination of advanced sensor technology and an automated training ecosystem, you will be given your personalized & optimal training routine, stride-by-stride guidance during every run, and in-depth insights that help all runners, from beginners to Olympic champions, regularly push their running performance to the next level.

How to start with Stryd:

New to Stryd? This app requires the Stryd pod in order to use the app.
Already have Stryd? You can sign in with your Stryd account, pair your pod, and get started with the app.

Perfect Pacing During Every Run:

Stryd accounts for your speed, slope, run form, fatigue, and wind to deliver perfect, precise, and painless pacing. This is accomplished with the Stryd pod. The pod is filled with motion & environmental sensors that comprehensively determine your running effort in nearly every running condition. With this info, you can evenly pace every run, which means you get the performance enhancing benefits from each training session — without undue fatigue.

Sweet Spot Training Every Day:

Stryd learns who you are as a runner and then prescribes daily training that is personalized to your current fitness. Next, you can import these workouts on your sportswatch and receive stride-by-stride guidance so you run at the right performance-enhancing intensity from start to finish. You stay in the training sweet spot, where you are perfectly balancing stress and rest, so that you receive the maximal benefits from each session and continue to improve.

Automated Insights That Keep You Improving:

Stryd analyzes and compares your similar training sessions against each other to let you know how your fitness is trending. You will know how much your recent training is paying off if you are moving in the right direction. If there is an opportunity to do better, you can quickly identify if you need to update your routine so you can keep the improvements coming.

Continually Beat Your Race Times:

Stryd plans your perfect race for you. Stryd can account for the unique layout of your race course, the weather, the altitude, your skillset, and your overall fitness to prescribe a race plan that will ensure you perform at your peak capability. You will step up to the starting line with confidence knowing that you will run your best race possible.

-----

Note that, Stryd uses GPS in the background to track your running distance and pace, and continued use of GPS running in the background can decrease battery life. Stryd also integrates with the Health app in order to get access to the heart rate data from Apple Watch.

Additionally, Stryd integrates with Apple Health. This allows Stryd to automatically update your weight, access your heart rate data, and save activity data to your Health app.

Track your Dart Games, view Statistics, Create Tournaments and Play Online against other players. All for free and automatically synchronized across all platforms.

TRACK DARTS GAMES
Track your darts games in the scoreboard in 6+ different game modes. Currently there is an extensive X01 game mode, as well as Cricket, Around the Clock, Shanghai, Elimination and Highscore. More game modes will be added all the time. For each game mode you have configuration options.
You can also customize the scoreboard, for example, you can choose the input method between "Whole round" and "Each dart individually".

VIEW STATISTICS
View extensive statistics about your dart games. There are many statistics for all game modes, which you can view both as a table and as a graph. In order not to lose the overview you can choose which statistics you want to see and which not.

ORGANIZE TOURNAMENTS
In tournament mode you can organize a league or knockout tournament with many people. A tournament schedule with a game list is automatically calculated and you can play the games one after the other. At any time you can see the current standings or who made it to the finals.

PLAY ONLINE AGAINST OTHERS
In the revamped online section, you can add your friends in the friends system and invite them to online matches. In addition, you can also create open lobbies and search for an opponent in the chat.
You can chat in the online area itself, in the lobby as well as during and after the game.
In the lobby and in the profiles of your opponents, you can see their abandonment rate and their usual average to decide if you want to enter the match.

SYNCHRONIZED ACROSS ALL PLATFORMS
Pro Darts is available on all platforms. If you use cloud players, your data is automatically synchronized on all your devices. So you won't lose stats and you'll be up to date on every device.

COMPETE AGAINST COMPUTERS
If you don't have a real opponent with you, you can train against computer opponents. Ten different difficulty levels are available. You can also add computer opponents in tournaments.
